html: Sweet cane—This was used in the making of that precious ointment, Exodus 30:34, and for the incense, Exodus 30:7. Thou hast been niggardly in my service, when thou hast, spared for no cost in the service of thine idols. Nor filled me—Thou hast not multiplied thy thank—offerings and free—will offerings, tho' I have given thee sufficient occasion to do so. But—Thou hast made me to bear the load and burden of thy sins.
